description: Number of 3-colored generalized Frobenius partitions of n.
comments: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
references: G. E. Andrews, "Generalized Frobenius Partitions," AMS Memoir 301, 1984 (sequence is denoted c\phi_3(n)).
links: M. Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of q^(1/8) * (eta(q)^3 + 9 * eta(q^9)^3) / (eta(q)^3 * eta(q^3)) in powers of q. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 09 2011Expansion of a(x) / f(-x)^3 in powers of x where a() is a cubic AGM theta function and f() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 21 2012Convolution of A000716 and A004016. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 09 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (eta(x + A)^3 + 9 * x * eta(x^9 + A)^3) / (eta(x + A)^3 * eta(x^3 + A)), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 09 2011 */
author: _James A. Sellers_, Apr 05 2000
